document.full_text: only one of four principal targets shot dead by u.s. commandos in the raid which killed osama bin laden was involved in any hostile fire, a person familiar with the latest u.s. government reporting on the raid told reuters on thursday.
document.title: bin laden, two others didn't fire on seals: sources
lines_and_colors: only one of four principal targets shot dead by u.s. commandos in the raid which killed osama bin laden was involved in any hostile fire, a person familiar with the latest u.s. government reporting on the raid told reuters on thursday.
